title: Samsung releases the April 2022 security patch update early for the Galaxy S22 series
content:
Samsung has been doing a phenomenal job of pushing Android security updates to its vast portfolio of devices over the last few years. On several occasions, the Korean OEM has released the latest security patches even before Google publishes the monthly security bulletin, and it has achieved this feat for the upcoming month of April

The post Samsung releases the April 2022 security patch update early for the Galaxy S22 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out April 2022 security patches to the Galaxy S22, Galaxy S22 Plus, and the Galaxy S22 Ultra. Read on!
